actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to cooperate with the governments of Central and South America in order to control outbreaks of plant pests and diseases when necessary to protect the agriculture of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to cooperate with the governments of Central and South America in order to control outbreaks of specified plant pests and diseases when necessary to protect the agriculture of the United States. Authorizes the annual appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to cooperate with the governments of Central and South America in order to control outbreaks of plant pests and diseases when necessary to protect the agriculture of the United States.
